summary: This document is an email chain from September 1, 2020, between staff at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). It discusses preparations for a press conference regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell, coordination on the Robert Hadden case, and requests for final press materials including remarks and Q&As for both the Epstein and Maxwell cases.
